# Ashtree

The `ashtree` system is a simplified version of the `flametree` package (https://github.com/djnavarro/flametree) that I use for teaching purposes. Sourcing the `ashtree.R` script creates the `ashtree.png` file. At the default settings (see line 112) the image generated looks like this:

![](ashtree.png)
